description:
• Instructed and mentored groups of up to 20 students (aged 7-14) in core coding fundamentals (Python, C#, JavaScript) and logical problem-solving.
  • Served as the primary trainer for new instructors, mentoring 15+ team members on curriculum delivery, software, and professional parent communication.
  • Acted as a senior resource for peers, providing guidance on advanced student challenges and effectively managing more complex assignments.
  • Played a key role in the center's adoption of Unity, applying personal expertise to help leadership successfully implement the new curriculum.
  • Managed parent communications and progress updates, ensuring families were confident in both their child's learning outcomes and engagement.
  • Recognized as 'Employee of the Month' within four months for high performance and dedication to enhancing the student learning experience.
